gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 102, Grizzlies 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics hang on and defeat the Grizzlies, 102-100. Kristaps Porzingis recorded 26 points, eight rebounds, and six blocks for the Celtics, while Jayson Tatum added 20 points and nine rebounds in the victory. Santi Aldama recorded a season high 28 points, six 3PM, and 12 rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Celtics have won 6 in a row and improve to 11-2 in the regular season, while the Grizzlies fall to 3-10.
